title: Looking for Ranked Team (Jungler)
body:
Gold V currently after a little tilt from Gold III, aiming for Plat next season.
Looking for at least Gold teammates that are relatively serious, and a potential mid/top laner 
that I can duo with often to practice gank timing's etc.

Mains: {{champion:28}} {{champion:107}} {{champion:2}} {{champion:20}} {{champion:64}} 
Probably in that order ^ 

Tyyyy b o i s

replies.body:
Hi there. I like the fact you are looking for a team. I see you main jungle. Do you have any other champs. Those champs are not as viable as they used to be. 

Lee Sin, Rengar and Nunu are still strong but not Olaf or Eve. Try and check the Meta and see what Champs there are for jungle.
Not anymore now people can upgrade trinket for a free vision ward whenever they want it. When playing against an eve, the adc gets BF sword then straight to vision trinket. It is not in meta anymore

> [{quoted}](name=AndyTheEskimo,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=HNJzfuAn,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-10-28T21:09:19.939+0000)
>
> Not anymore now people can upgrade trinket for a free vision ward whenever they want it. When playing against an eve, the adc gets BF sword then straight to vision trinket. It is not in meta anymore

If eve waits to gank / snowball by the time they get a trinket upgrade she hasn't done her job. She is still a good jungler in the right team comps.
